innhold.avsnitt: Your parental benefit period will start no later than 3 weeks before the expected date of delivery. You can choose to start as early as 12 weeks before the expected date of delivery, but you will then receive fewer weeks after the birth.
If you adopt, your parental benefit period commences when care of the child is assumed.
If you adopt from abroad, you can choose if you would like to start receiving the parental benefit when you assume care of the child while abroad, or the day you arrive in Norway with the child.
